languages.text: Там, где простые смертные уже дрожали бы в слезах, Вольный Торговец лишь стиснул{mf||а} зубы. Рядом слышны были вскрики и стоны — морок зацепил и других. Енхо Сон, капитан отряда, отрывисто отдавал приказы. Его люди удерживали поддавшихся потустороннему страху товарищей, пытающихся вырваться и бежать вглубь проклятого корабля. Несколько минут — и отряд, хоть и изрядно напуганный, готов был продолжать путь.

traits.locale_text: Там, где простые смертные уже дрожали бы в слезах, Вольный Торговец лишь стиснул{mf||а} зубы. Рядом слышны были вскрики и стоны — морок зацепил и других. Енхо Сон, капитан скаут-отряда, отрывисто отдавал приказы. Его люди удерживали поддавшихся потустороннему страху товарищей, пытающихся вырваться и бежать вглубь проклятого корабля. Несколько минут — и отряд, хоть и изрядно напуганный, готов был продолжать путь.

languages.text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.
languages.original_text: Там, где простые смертные уже дрожали бы в слезах, Вольный Торговец лишь стиснул{mf||а} зубы. Рядом слышны были вскрики и стоны — морок зацепил и других. Несколько минут — и отряд, хоть и изрядно напуганный, готов был продолжать путь.

Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.

languages.text: Donde los mortales comunes solo podrían temblar y llorar, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se limitó a apretar los dientes. Cerca de allí se oían gritos y gemidos de otras víctimas de la ilusión. Young-ho Sohn, capitán de la unidad, dio varias órdenes. Su equipo contuvo a sus camaradas que habían caído presa del terror sobrenatural e intentaban escapar a las entrañas de la nave maldita. Al cabo de unos minutos, la unidad, aunque aterrada, estaba lista para continuar.
languages.original_text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.

traits.locale_text: Donde los mortales comunes solo podrían temblar y llorar, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se limitó a apretar los dientes. Cerca de allí se oían gritos y gemidos de otras víctimas de la ilusión. Young-ho Sohn, capitán de la unidad, dio varias órdenes. Su equipo contuvo a sus camaradas que habían caído presa del terror sobrenatural e intentaban escapar a las entrañas de la nave maldita. Al cabo de unos minutos, la unidad, aunque aterrada, estaba lista para continuar.

languages.text: 换做是普通人，这种时候恐怕已经瑟瑟发抖、低声哭泣了，但行商浪人仅仅是咬紧了牙关。附近传来了尖叫与呻吟，队伍中的其他人也受到了幻觉的影响。探索队队长宋永和高声下达着命令，清醒的队员拖着那些受到幻觉影响的队友们，挣扎着，继续朝这艘被诅咒的飞船深处跑去。几分钟过去了，尽管队员们都被吓破了胆，但依然做好了继续前进的准备。
languages.original_text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.

traits.locale_text: 换做是普通人，这种时候恐怕已经瑟瑟发抖、低声哭泣了，但行商浪人仅仅是咬紧了牙关。附近传来了尖叫与呻吟，队伍中的其他人也受到了幻觉的影响。探索队队长宋永和高声下达着命令，清醒的队员拖着那些受到幻觉影响的队友们，挣扎着，继续朝这艘被诅咒的飞船深处跑去。几分钟过去了，尽管队员们都被吓破了胆，但依然做好了继续前进的准备。

languages.text: 普通の人間ならすでに震えて泣いているところだが、自由開拓者はただ歯を食いしばっている。叫び声やうめき声が近くで聞こえる―他の者達も幻覚に捕らわれているのだ。ソン・ヨンホ中隊長が大声で命令を出す。彼のチームは不気味な恐怖に飲まれており、ここから離れて呪われた船の奥深くまで逃げようともがく仲間達を引き留めた。数分が経過し、部隊は意識が不明瞭になるほど怯えながらも先へ進む準備はできている。
languages.original_text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.

traits.locale_text: 普通の人間ならすでに震えて泣いているところだが、自由開拓者はただ歯を食いしばっている。叫び声やうめき声が近くで聞こえる―他の者達も幻覚に捕らわれているのだ。ソン・ヨンホ中隊長が大声で命令を出す。彼のチームは不気味な恐怖に飲まれており、ここから離れて呪われた船の奥深くまで逃げようともがく仲間達を引き留めた。数分が経過し、部隊は意識が不明瞭になるほど怯えながらも先へ進む準備はできている。

languages.text: Normale Sterbliche hätten bereits gezittert und geweint, aber {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} biss lediglich die Zähne zusammen. Um {mf|ihn|sie} herum erklangen Schreie und Stöhnen – auch andere hatte die Illusion gepackt. Young-ho Sohn, der Captain der Einheit, erteilte Befehle. Sein Team hielt die Kameraden im Zaum, die dem unheimlichen Schrecken zum Opfer gefallen waren und nun bemüht waren, sich loszureißen und tiefer in das verfluchte Schiff zu laufen. Einige Minuten vergingen, und schließlich war die Einheit bereit zum Weitergehen, wenn auch völlig verängstigt.
languages.original_text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. languages.text: Dans ce moment où le commun des mortels se serait mis à pleurer en tremblant de peur, {name} se contenta de serrer les dents. Parmi les cris et les gémissements qui s'élevaient à proximité, signes que l'illusion avait frappé d'autres membres de l'unité, le capitaine Young-ho Sohn aboya des ordres. Ses hommes maîtrisèrent ceux qui avaient cédé à cette étrange terreur et qui se débattaient pour prendre la fuite dans les profondeurs du vaisseau maudit. Au bout de quelques minutes, l'équipe se calma suffisamment pour reprendre sa route, quoique secouée par cet incident.
languages.original_text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.

languages.text: Sıradan fâniler olsa korkudan titrer, ağlamaya başlardı, Hür Tacir'se dişini sıkmakla yetindi. Yakınlardan yükselen çığlıklar ve inlemeler, diğerlerinin de bu illüzyona yenik düştüğünü gösteriyordu. Birimin yüzbaşı Young-ho Sohn, emir yağdırıyordu. Eşi benzeri görülmemiş bu dehşetin pençelerine düşenler, kaçıp lanetli geminin derinliklerine gitmeye çalışıyor; bu sırada yüzbaşının takımı, bedbaht yoldaşlarını zapt etmeye çalışıyordu. Dehşete kapılmış birim, birkaç dakika sonrasında yolculuğa devam etmeye hazırdı.
languages.original_text: Where simple mortals would already be trembling and weeping, the Rogue Trader only gritted {mf|his|her} teeth. Shrieks and moans could be heard close by — others were gripped by the illusion too. Young-ho Sohn, the unit captain, barked out orders. His team held back their comrades who had fallen victim to the uncanny terror and who were struggling to break free and run deeper into the cursed ship. A few minutes passed, and the unit, though scared senseless, was ready to continue.

traits.locale_text: Sıradan fâniler olsa korkudan titrer, ağlamaya başlardı ancak Hür Tacir dişini sıkmakla yetindi. Yakınlardan yükselen çığlıklar ve inlemeler, diğerlerinin de bu illüzyona yenik düştüğünü gösteriyordu. Birimin yüzbaşı Young-ho Sohn emir yağdırıyordu. Eşi benzeri görülmemiş bu dehşetin pençelerine düşenler, kaçıp lanetli geminin derinliklerine gitmeye çalışırken yüzbaşının takımı, bedbaht yoldaşlarını zapt etmeye çalışıyordu. Birkaç dakika geçti ve dehşete kapılmış birim, yolculuğa devam etmeye hazırdı.
